Comment.Text: The signal display provides real-time and asynchronous feedback of the user's brain activity in the Beta band, related to feet movement.
You can browse each box' documentation by selecting the box and pressing F1

Overview This scenario allows to quickly replay an online session of feet motor imagery, and watch the corresponding feedback. The feedback is presented through signal displays : one for the brain activity on the Cz electrode, and one for the band power in the beta activity,related to (imagined) feet movement.
Crop the signal between Mean + 3 * Variance and Mean + 6 * Variance
This two boxes are configured with respect to a previous calibration session. The calibration computed the Mean and Variance of the Beta activity during 30sec of inactivity.
Filtering in the [16-24Hz] frequency band and display
